long_description: You'll have big-time fun with the fast-rolling 29 in. wheels of the Marin Palisades Trail SE 29er. It smooths out bumps with a RockShox fork and powers up climbs with trusty Shimano components. 6061 aluminum frame features triple-butted, hydroformed top and down tubes for excellent strength; seat- and chainstays are double-butted and shaped for minimal flex. RockShox XC 30 TK fork offers 100mm of travel; adjust the preload the way you like or just lock it out when bumps aren't an issue. 30 speeds offer gear options for all-out speed on the flats and climbing up the steepest grades. Shimano XT rear derailleur delivers smooth shifting throughout the subtle variations of the 10-cog cassette; Deore front derailleur snaps across the 3 chainrings. Shimano M445 hydraulic disc brakes optimize stopping power. Alex SX44 rims are paired with Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires, which clear soil quickly and provide reliable performance climbing, braking and cornering all year around. Specs of the the Marin Palisades Trail SE 29er are subject to change.
short_description: You'll have big-time fun with the fast-rolling 29 in. wheels of the Marin Palisades Trail SE 29er. It smooths out bumps with a RockShox fork and powers up climbs with trusty Shimano components.
